categories: Category:Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker Adaptation

Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker Adaptation is the upcoming miniseries of the comic series Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker Adaptation, an adaptation of the film of the same name. The issue will be written by Jody Houser, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published by Marvel Comics. On April 1, 2020, Marvel Comics was forced to stall their publishing line due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Eventually, Marvel announced they would resume their publishing line on May 27, 2020, but did not mention a new release date for any of this series' postponed issues.
